Package index

Configuration & Environment

Functions for configuring simulation execution and detecting the runtime environment (local vs HPC cluster).

medsim_config()
Create Simulation Configuration
medsim_detect_environment()
Detect Computing Environment
medsim_detect_cores()
Detect Number of Available Cores
medsim_get_optimal_cores()
Get Optimal Number of Cores
medsim_estimate_speedup()
Estimate Parallel Speedup
medsim_compare_configs()
Compare Multiple Configurations

Simulation Scenarios

Functions for defining and validating simulation scenarios with ground truth parameters.

medsim_scenario()
Create Custom Simulation Scenario
medsim_scenarios_mediation()
Create Standard Mediation Scenarios
medsim_validate_scenario()
Validate Scenario

Running Simulations

Core functions for executing Monte Carlo simulations with progress tracking and parallel processing.

medsim_run()
Run Simulation Study
medsim_run_parallel()
Run Tasks in Parallel

Result Analysis

Functions for analyzing simulation results including coverage, power, and method comparisons.

medsim_analyze()
Analyze Simulation Results
medsim_analyze_coverage()
Analyze Coverage Rates
medsim_analyze_power()
Analyze Statistical Power
medsim_compare_methods()
Compare Multiple Methods
medsim_check_results()
Check Results for Errors

Caching

Functions for caching ground truth values and simulation results to avoid redundant computation.

medsim_cache_init()
Initialize Cache Directory
medsim_cache_save()
Save Object to Cache
medsim_cache_load()
Load Object from Cache
medsim_cache_exists()
Check if Cache Exists
medsim_cache_list()
List Cache Files
medsim_cache_info()
Get Cache Info
medsim_cache_clear()
Clear Cache

Visualization

Functions for creating publication-ready figures from simulation results.

medsim_plot_coverage()
Plot Coverage Rates
medsim_plot_error_boxplot()
Plot Error Distribution Boxplots
medsim_plot_timing()
Plot Timing Comparison
medsim_plot_combined_panel()
Create Combined Multi-Panel Figure

LaTeX Tables

Functions for generating publication-ready LaTeX tables from simulation results.

medsim_table_accuracy()
Generate Accuracy Table
medsim_table_comparison()
Generate Method Comparison Table
medsim_table_coverage()
Generate Coverage Table
medsim_table_power()
Generate Power Table
medsim_table_timing()
Generate Timing Comparison Table
medsim_tables_workflow()
Generate All Tables
medsim_write_table()
Write Table to File

Print & Summary Methods

S3 methods for printing and summarizing medsim objects.

print(<medsim_analysis>)
Print Analysis Results
print(<medsim_comparison>)
Print Method Comparison
print(<medsim_config>)
Print Configuration Summary
print(<medsim_coverage>)
Print Coverage Results
print(<medsim_power>)
Print Power Results
print(<medsim_results>)
Print Simulation Results
print(<medsim_scenario>)
Print Scenario Summary
print(<medsim_table>)
Print medsim_table
summary(<medsim_results>)
Summarize Simulation Results
